title: What's the freaking hold up on Diana skins?
body:
I know Diana won the poll for the Fire/Ice skin, and I'm sure it will be great, but aside from that, she's been out for THREE AND A HALF YEARS now and has received ONE post-release skin.

What's up with this, Riot?  Is she some sacred cow or something?  I get not releasing skin for champs like Taric (who has a complete overhaul coming soon), and Yorick (who Riot has admitted needs a rework but isn't really touching for a good long while)...but why Diana?  What's the hold up?  

Many champs (including champs released after her) have gotten MULTIPLE skins in the time it took her to just get ONE.
